body:
**I am unable to get the information of the input address when I queried a transaction details.**


#

			"hex": "47304402205f040f4582e212ccdd185943dd9ed76b258061f03f6cd13c57304dbbeff38dc502206196d41f143bbce09887cf3a025453a26cd11e4a588320018fd86dcf51c496b701210365cd3b076fb1eb4e2e029108d621f7641c735b1f7bb190d21eab2f75293f5b36"
		},

	}],
	"vout": [{

		"scriptPubKey": {
			"asm": "OP_DUP OP_HASH160 c6dece7fd7e1e525b0e767e532876d3f5508ac42 OP_EQUALVERIFY OP_CHECKSIG",
			"hex": "76a914c6dece7fd7e1e525b0e767e532876d3f5508ac4288ac",
			"reqSigs": 1,

title: How to return input address in getrawtransactionï¼
